events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering department for further consideration.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to handle your application moving forward.
We completed the initial screening of your profile and found your experience relevant to the Software Engineer role.
Thank you for your prompt reply confirming availability for the next interview stage; we appreciate your enthusiasm.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10 AM UTC to assess your software development skills.
The technical interview was successfully completed; the panel was impressed with your coding proficiency and problem-solving approach.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 15th to discuss cultural fit and finalize the next steps in the recruitment process.
Your HR interview went well; the recruiters appreciated your communication skills and alignment with company values.
We are pleased to extend you a formal offer for the Software Engineer position with details about salary, benefits, and start date.
Thank you for your feedback on the offer; we're glad to hear that the terms meet your expectations and are eager to have you join.
You have officially accepted the offer, and we are excited to welcome you onboard as a new Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has begun; we have scheduled your orientation sessions and access to required development tools.
The hiring process is officially closed, and your employment as a Software Engineer is confirmed with all paperwork completed.
